Checkpoint 2

Show your TA the following.

  1. The code for your Atom class.
  2. The results of running your AtomTest class.
  3. The HTML documentation for your Atom class.
  4. The results of running the SpecChecker.
  5. Your correctly submitted zip file on your Blackboard submission history page.
Finally, show the TA that you can download the file you submitted on Blackboard and open it up to check its contents.
